actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that supplemental security income benefits shall be payable only to aged, blind, or disabled individuals who are both citizens and residents of the United States.

summary.text: Amends Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled) of the Social Security Act to make benefits under such Title payable only to individuals who are both citizens and residents of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that supplemental security income benefits shall be payable only to aged, blind, or disabled individuals who are both citizens and residents of the United States.
